reqs:
Pre-reqs: Two of POLI 220, POLI 320, POLI 321, POLI 322, POLI 323, POLI 324, POLI 325, POLI 326, POLI 327, POLI 328, POLI 329, POLI 330, POLI 331, POLI 332, POLI 333, POLI 350, POLI 351.
This seminar will meet in Buchanan C403. Jointly taught with POLI 516B 001.
Registration by permission of the instructor only.
Taught by Professor Jeong: gyung-ho.jeong@ubc.ca
courseName: Advanced Topics in Comparative Politics - ADV TPCS CMP PLI
description: Seminar in comparative analysis of politics in democratic systems. For specific content in a given year, consult the departmental website.
